column5: Gay Lea is looking for Plant helpers for operating equipment $16.00+, bagging powders $16.00+, Maintenance Supervisor $?? & Maintenance worker $ ??, 1 more Plant Supervisor $?? wages will depend on experience & I don't know what it is for sure, Plant Workers I think start at $16.69? SBK
Is this first hand?  Do you have a contact number for the Maintenance Supervisors job?
Mighty nice of you giving a heads up for anyone looking for work

I've worked there as an Operator for 12 yrs now, they made some of us Lead Hands back quite a few years, we just landed a 2 year contract with Chapman's Ice Cream in Markdale, we started making blends for there Ice Cream after their Fire over a year ago & just landed a Contract because of that SBK PS: I sent you a PM
So your name is safe as a referrence then right? J/K  Thanks for the pm.  One never know where life can lead them.

I was offered one of the Production Supervisor's Jobs Dec 21 moving up from Plant Operator, there are 3 of us now & they are looking for one more last I heard, they have a few names in for Maintenance &/or Maintenance Supervisor but I haven't heard of any interviews yet, I think they have 1 Resume for Production Supervisor & a hand full for plant workers SBK Richard Elliott Jr
